ColourWords.Title: Likes and dislikes
ColourWords.Instruction: One word in each sentence is unnecessary. Click on the extra word.

ContentColourWords.Sentence: 2. I am quite like keen on cooking for myself.
3. She doesn't mind keen getting up early.
4. He doesn't can't stand chatting on the phone.
5. We're not very keen mind on Chinese food.
6. I don't to like waiting for the bus.
7. He is absolutely loves going clubbing.

10. They are absolutely quite keen on reading.
